meetup.title: November Meetup
meetup.description: This month we'll be examining COLOR! Timothy Brownawell will give a short talk on color and contrast, and we'll follow it up with a roundtable discussion, and a few short CSS and JavaScript demos.

podcast.title: Episode I: The Phantom Podcast
podcast.description: The hosts discuss their various backgrounds, how they got into tech and how newbies and beginners can find their way in the ever-shifting landscape

podcast.title: Episode 2: JavaScript Fatigue
podcast.description: Ever feel like there's a new JavaScript library, framework or technique every week? That's probably because there is. Bryan, Eric and Nathanael discuss getting fatigued, fighting through it.

podcast.title: Episode 3: Web Workers Rewind - Modern CSS
podcast.description: From the August Web Workers meetup in Memphis, Tenn. Bryan speaks about Post-Modern CSS including Object-Fit, Clip-path and CSS Grid.

podcast.title: Episode 4: Web Workers Rewind - Meteor Up and Running
podcast.description: From the August Web Workers meetup in Memphis, Tenn. Eric talks about getting up and running in MeteorJS.
